otherNames: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Maji Love 1000%, うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ マジLOVE1000%
synopsis: Nanami Haruka wants to be a song writer, so she attends an idol training school filled with beautiful bishounen. The school pairs each aspiring songwriter with an aspiring idol, but Haruka finds herself paired with 3 idols! To make things more difficult, Nanami is also not allowed to date any of her beautiful partners!
